_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
mn37:11.6+mn37:11.7: Sakka, lord of gods and the Gods of the Thirty-Three
before^mn37:12.4^who_around: Vessavaṇa, the Great King, Sakka's maids
before^mn37:12.4^where: Sāvatthī in the Eastern Monastery, the stilt longhouse of Migāra's mother, Single Lotus Park, Palace of Victory
where: Sāvatthī in the Eastern Monastery, the stilt longhouse of Migāra's mother, Single Lotus Park, Palace of Victory
